name: SEC EDGAR Data Extraction Agent
description: A comprehensive agent that extracts financial data, filings, and reports from the SEC EDGAR database using official SEC APIs. Can fetch company information, financial statements, XBRL data, and filing history for comprehensive financial analysis.
author: AgentHub

operation.description: Type of SEC EDGAR operation to perform

cik.description: Company CIK number (10-digit identifier) for single company operations

ciks.description: List of CIK numbers for comparison operations

query.description: Search query for company search operations

concept.description: XBRL concept to analyze (e.g., NetIncomeLoss, Assets, Revenues)

taxonomy.description: XBRL taxonomy to use (us-gaap, ifrs-full, dei, srt)

unit.description: Unit of measure for frame data (USD, shares, etc.)

period.description: Time period for frame data (e.g., CY2023, CY2023Q1)

report_type.description: Type of financial report to generate

examples.name: Get Apple Company Information
examples.description: Fetch basic company information and filing history for Apple Inc.

examples.name: Financial Analysis for Microsoft
examples.description: Analyze key financial metrics and ratios for Microsoft Corporation

examples.name: Compare Tech Companies
examples.description: Compare net income across Apple, Microsoft, and Alphabet

examples.name: Generate Comprehensive Report
examples.description: Generate a comprehensive financial report with AI insights for Apple Inc.

examples.name: Search for Companies
examples.description: Search for companies by ticker symbol or name

examples.name: Get XBRL Concept Data
examples.description: Get historical assets data for Apple Inc. from XBRL filings

limitations: Requires valid CIK numbers for company-specific operations
Rate limited by SEC API (100ms delay between requests)
Some data may be delayed by up to 1 minute after filing
AI insights require OpenAI API key
Limited to publicly available SEC data
